tool_description: This API helps query for Famous Movies and TV shows quotes.
title: Movie and TV shows Quotes

api_list.name: GET quotes by actor
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back quotes by the given actor or actress.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-and-tv-shows-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/actor/{actor}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-and-tv-shows-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET a random quote
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a random quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-and-tv-shows-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/random/quote"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-and-tv-shows-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET quote by movie or TV show name
api_list.description: This endpoint will return quotes by given movie or TV show name

api_list.name: Get individual quotes by quote ID
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back individual quotes based on the given ID
api_list.code:

headers = {

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-and-tv-shows-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all quotes
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the quotes in the API
api_list.code:
